entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %

Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
